author: vmassol
msg: Modified default value of maven.cruisecontrol.logs.mergedirectory so that CC can aggregate JUnit test reports both for single project and multiproject setups.

author: pquerna
msg: Hook the PostgreSQL DBD driver into autoconf.
The current code will not autodetect Postgres on all systems.

author: antonio
msg: Fix the shutdown issue. Now this class uses start() and stop() methods instead of the main().
